app.title: Lazar Stojanović - Software Engineer
app.description: Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience in React, Angular, and TypeScript.

hero.name: Lazar Stojanović
hero.valueProp: I build and lead frontend teams that deliver high-quality products.
hero.subtitle: Specializing in React, Angular, and TypeScript. Passionate about mentoring and team leadership.
hero.credibility: 5+ years · Currently at Symphony · Previously HTEC Group

intro.paragraph: I specialize in creating clean, maintainable architectures that prioritize performance and user experience. My approach focuses on writing code that scales, performs well under load, and remains easy to understand and modify over time.

project1.name: Financial Platform
project1.problem: Leading frontend development for a financial services platform with complex data requirements.

project2.name: Telecommunications Platform
project2.problem: Built and maintained a major telecommunications platform with micro-frontend architecture.

project3.name: Healthcare UI Library
project3.problem: Developed a complete UI component library using Radix for healthcare applications.

experience.description: From healthcare to telecommunications, I've led teams and shipped products that matter.
